title.value: Development of estimation of the investment effectiveness
Development of estimation of the investment effectiveness

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Bevzelyuk, A.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Global economic system supposes development of the tendencies of interrelated movement of finance and technologies and transfer of financial centers into global consulting and information centers, supplying investment policy and optimization of investment process. But in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus preparation of investment projects appears a serious shortcoming in the 'science-production' cycle.  Unreliability of the projects' evaluation and incompleteness of normative documents, regulating investment process leads to deficiency of profitable invest projects, positively influencing national economy. The possibilities of improvement of economic analysis are discussed in the article. Some suggestions dealing with methods of evaluation of new technologies and investment have been made.
